title: IIT Council meet today: Credit transfer among IITs, scholarships, making JEE (A) less coaching-dependent on agenda
description: The council will also discuss necessary changes in curriculum, pedagogy, and assessments in response to the advent of Artificial Intelligence. | Education News
content: IIT Council, the apex coordination body of the 23 premier engineering institutes, will meet on Monday after a gap of two years, and discuss crucial issues, including the sharing of credits amongst IITs, and making JEE Advanced less coaching-dependent... [1778 chars]

title: IIT Council to meet after 2 years: Credit transfer among IITs, accreditation, JEE reforms on agenda
description: The IIT Council is set to convene after two years to address critical issues, including credit sharing among IITs under the National Credit Framework. Discussions will also focus on making JEE Advanced less coaching-dependent and adapting curriculum to the rise of Artificial Intelligence.

title: China bets on AI to pump trillions into economy amid national computing push
description: With artificial intelligence a critical battleground in the China-US rivalry, a national computing network has already signed up more than 100 AI models.
content:
China is banking on artificial intelligence (AI) to become a new growth engine, and there are projections that it could add several trillion yuan to the economy by 2035 amid a national push for computing power and a unified data market.

title: How AI will cut staff and reshape offices
description: Design firm Hassell’s latest global survey shows 63 per cent of tasks for which people use artificial intelligence would otherwise be done at workstations.
content: Employers will need fewer workstations as the use of artificial intelligence replaces desk-based jobs and offices will increasingly become places where people gather to share information and meet in person, design firm Hassell’s latest global survey ... [280 chars]

title: Reasoning AI: Cracking the IIT test is a giant leap for machine-kind
description: Recently, Google’s Gemini 2.5 Pro topped India’s IIT Joint Entrance Examination. Artificial intelligence (AI) has clearly leapt beyond mimicking patterns and can now be used in fields where reasoning is crucial.
content: When ChatGPT first appeared in late 2022, it could charm us with words but stumbled with numbers. It could draft a sonnet in the style of Shakespeare but might guess wildly if asked to multiply 17 by 24. Two years plus later, the tables have turned. ... [5367 chars]
